info.title: Timelog Web API version 1 (BETA)
info.description: This documentation is in BETA release, we'll update the API without prior notice.

get.summary: Get a list of absence code by status (all, inactive, active)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: An enum of ActiveStatus, can be all(-1), inactive(0) or active(1)

get.summary: Get a list of absence code that user has registered time on

post.summary: Create registration of absence with half the normal working time

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Contains the type which should be half day (0)

post.summary: Create registration of absence with hours
Create registration of absence with full normal working time
Create registration of absence with half/full day.

get.summary: Gets all.
Gets the by identifier.
Get a list of currency by status (all, inactive, active)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: An enum of ActiveStatus, can be all(-1), inactive(0) or active(1)

get.summary: Get all the customers
Get the customer with the customer identifier
Search for customer that the user can register time on, with customer information

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Customer name, customer nickname, or customer number

get.summary: Search for customer that the user can register time on, with customer information (Result is ordered by recent registration)

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Customer name, customer nickname, or customer number

get.summary: Get all the employee expenses

500.description: Employee expense with the user identifier does not exist

get.summary: Get the employee expense with the employee expense identifier

500.description: Employee expense with the identifier does not exist

delete.summary: Delete employee expense with the employee expense identifier

500.description: Employee expense with the identifier does not exist

post.summary: Attach a image to an employee expense.

200.description: Successfully attach the image to the employee expense

500.description: Failed to attach image to the employee expense

delete.summary: Delete employee expense image with the employee expense identifier and the image url

500.description: Employee expense image with the identifier and image does not exist

get.summary: Get the employee expense financial data information of the user by the given date
Get a list of employee expense financial data information of the user by the given period

200.description: A list of employee expense financial data

get.summary: Get a list of employee projection in the period
Get a list of expense type by status (all, inactive, active)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: An enum of ActiveStatus, can be all(-1), inactive(0) or active(1)

get.summary: Indexes this instance.
Get a list of payment method belonging to the user by status (all, inactive, active)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: An enum of ActiveStatus, can be all(-1), inactive(0) or active(1)

get.summary: Get a project by the project identifier

500.description: Project with the identifier does not exist

get.summary: Search for project that the user can register time on, with the project information
Search for project that the user can register time on (Result is ordered by recent registration)
Search for project that the user can register time on, that belongs to a customer
Search for project that the user can register time on, that belongs to a customer (Result is ordered by recent registration)

200.description: Employee expense was created created successfully

500.description: Employee expense could not be created for the project

get.summary: Get a task with the task identifier

500.description: Task with the TaskID provided does not exist

get.summary: Get a list of task that the user has registered time on
Search for task that the user can register time on, that belongs to a project
Search for task that the user can register time on, that belongs to the customer

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Customer name, customer nickname or customer number

get.summary: Search for task that the user can register time on, with the task information
Search for task that the user can register time on, with the task information (Result is ordered by recent registration)
Search for task that the user can register time on, that belongs to a project
Search for task that the user can register time on, that belongs to a customer
Search for task that the user can register time on, that belongs to a project (Result is ordered by recent registration)
Search for task that the user can register time on, that belongs to a customer (Result is ordered by recent registration)

post.summary: Create registration with task and hour

get.summary: Get time registration with the time registration identifier

200.description: No time registration with the identifier was found

parameters.name: timeRegistrationApiUpdateModel
parameters.description: The registration that needs to be updated

500.description: Time registration could not be updated

parameters.name: timeRegistrationApiCreateModel
parameters.description: The time registration API create model.

500.description: Time registration could not be created

200.description: Time tracker created for this registration

post.summary: Update absence registration with full day or half day normal working time

delete.summary: Delete time registration with the GUID

get.summary: Get the financial data information of the user by the given date
Get a list of financial data information of the user by the given period

200.description: A list of time registration financial data

get.summary: Gets all.

put.summary: Updates the specified time tracker API update model detail.

parameters.name: timeTrackerApiUpdateModelDetail
parameters.description: The time tracker API update model detail.

post.summary: Creates the specified time tracker API create model.

parameters.name: timeTrackerApiCreateModel
parameters.description: The time tracker API create model.

get.summary: Gets the by identifier.

delete.summary: Delete the specified time tracker identifier.

get.summary: Gets the user active time tracking.

post.summary: Start the time tracker for task.
Start the time tracker for absence.

get.summary: Get the time tracking item by the time registration identifier

500.description: No time tracking item matching the identifier is found

get.summary: Get a list of time tracking item by the given period

200.description: A list of time tracking item

get.summary: Get a list of time tracking item by the given period, ordered by recent registration

200.description: A list of time tracking item

get.summary: Get a list of all users in the organization
Get the current user information
Get a user with the user identifier

500.description: No user matching the identifier was found

get.summary: Get user settings such as BillableHourIsEditable

200.description: A list of User Settings that is defined by the system admin
